string.name: youPlayTheWhitePiecesInAllPuzzles
string.comment: Appears in Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm) and Puzzle Racer (https://lichess.org/racer), before you start, letting you know which side you will be playing in all the puzzles that will be presented to you over the next few minutes.

resources.string: C\'hoari a rit gant ar re wenn e pep poelladenn

string.name: youPlayTheBlackPiecesInAllPuzzles
string.comment: Appears in Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm) and Puzzle Racer (https://lichess.org/racer), before you start, letting you know which side you will be playing in all the puzzles that will be presented to you over the next few minutes.

resources.string: C\'hoari a rit gant ar re zu e pep poelladenn

string.name: newDailyHighscore
string.comment:
Appears when you achieve a new high score after a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm). If you achieve a new best score for that week, month or all-time, strings for those will appear instead.
'Daily' here refers to today's date.

string.name: newWeeklyHighscore
string.comment:
Appears when you achieve a new high score after a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm). If you achieve a new best score for that month or all the time you have played Puzzle Storm, strings for those will appear instead.
'Weekly' here refers to the current week.

string.name: newMonthlyHighscore
string.comment:
Appears when you achieve a new high score after a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm). If you achieve a new best score for all the time you have played Puzzle Storm, a striung saying 'New all-time highscore!' will appear instead.
'Monthly' here refers to the current month.

string.name: newAllTimeHighscore
string.comment: Appears when you achieve a new high score after a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm) which surpasses your previous record.

string.name: previousHighscoreWasX
string.comment: %s is the number of puzzles solved as part of a run of Puzzle Storm.

resources.string: Ho tisoc\'h gwellañ kent a oa %s

string.name: highscoreX
string.comment: Appears in a player's activity feed and shows the high score in Puzzle Storm or Puzzle Racer.

string.name: score
string.comment:
Your score in Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm) is a count the puzzles you completed in a single run.
We simply title this 'score' as it is the most important metric of all.

string.name: moves
string.comment:
Moves in this context means your 'total moves' you made in your previous Puzzle Storm attempt. This is relevant because each puzzle may contain several moves.
Your total moves are displayed after completing a run of Puzzle Storm, alongside your other results.

string.name: accuracy
string.comment: Your accuracy in solving puzzles is displayed after completing a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm), alongside your other results.

string.name: combo
string.comment:
_Please make your translation as short and snappy as possible._ In Puzzle Storm and Puzzle Racer, a 'Combo' is a consecutive sequence of correct moves. Each correct move fills the combo bar. When the bar is full, you get a time bonus, and you increase the value of the next bonus. If you make the wrong move, you lose your combo.
This string is the title for your best combo, shown in the stats page after completing a run of puzzle storm or a puzzle race. It is also shown while you play.
Used in the same way in both Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm) and Puzzle Racer (https://lichess.org/racer).

string.name: time
string.comment:
Time in this context means the total time that has passed in your previous run. The string is displayed after completing a run of Puzzle Storm (https://lichess.org/storm).
Total time can vary depending on how well you do in puzzle storm. Winning puzzles builds up your combo and adds more time each time you complete a puzzle, while failing puzzles will reset your combo and also remove seconds from the clock.

string.name: highscores
string.comment: A heading showing your high scores in Puzzle Storm.

string.name: viewBestRuns
string.comment: Lets you view your best results in Puzzle Storm. Links to https://lichess.org/storm/dashboard

string.name: runs
string.comment:
A run is a complete session of Puzzle Storm as an activity.
Appears in your Puzzle Storm dashboard: https://lichess.org/storm/dashboard

resources.string: O c\'hortoz c\'hoarierien ouzhpenn da zont...
Kemer perzh en ur redadeg foran
Grit ar redadeg a-enep ho mignoned

string.name: skip
string.comment:
A button which lets you skip a move in a puzzle without penalty.
Players of Puzzle Racer (https://lichess.org/racer) are allowed to skip a single move across all the puzzles they are presented during a puzzle race.
Please keep this as short as possible, since it is on a narrow button.

resources.string: Gallout a rit lammat un taol eus pep redadeg:
Lammit war an taol-se evit derc\'hel ho kombo! Ur wech e pep redadeg hepken.
